activeIngredients: Per tab Vit B1 100 mg,  vit B6 5 mg,  vit B12 50 mcg. Per 2 mL inj Vit B1 200 mg,  vit B6 50 mg,  vit B12 1,000 mcg
details.atc: A11DB - Vitamin B1 in combination with vitamin B6 and/or vitamin B12 ; Used as dietary supplements.
J05AF05 - lamivudine ; Belongs to the class of nucleoside and nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitors. Used in the systemic treatment of viral infections.
